articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: US children fall further behind in reading, make little improvement in math on national exam - CNN
articles.description: America’s children have continued to lose ground on reading skills in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic and have made little improvement in math, according to the latest results of an exam known as the nation’s report card.
